concept.title: Algorithms for generating and verifying a PIN

titlealts.searchtitle: (): Algorithms for generating and verifying a PIN

concept.shortdesc: CCA supports the following algorithms for generating and verifying personal identification numbers.

ul.li: IBM 3624 customer-selected PIN (through a PIN offset)
IBM German Bank Pool PIN (verify through an institution key)
VISA PIN through a VISA PIN validation value
